name: Paul Lister
residence: Newcastle, Tyne and Wear, United Kingdom
birthPlace: Newcastle, Tyne and Wear, United Kingdom
bio:
Paul Lister, the rising star in the world of boxing, is making waves with his impressive stature and skillset. Standing at an impressive height of 191cm, Lister towers over his opponents, giving him a distinct advantage in the ring. This attribute allows him to not only deliver powerful punches but also to maintain a solid defense against his rivals.

With a reach of 191cm, matching his height perfectly, Lister possesses the ability to cover a significant distance with his punches. This lanky reach ensures that his opponents have a hard time getting close to him, while Lister himself can connect his punches from a safe distance. It's as if his arms have an extended presence in the ring, keeping his adversaries at bay.

Outside of his impressive physical attributes, Paul Lister brings a wealth of experience to the sport of boxing. With over 20 years of professional experience, Lister has seen it all in the ring. He knows the ropes of the trade, having faced various opponents with different styles and strategies throughout his career.

Throughout his journey, Lister has carved out a reputation for being a versatile boxer. His adaptability is showcased in his ability to switch up his approach depending on his opponent's strengths and weaknesses. Whether it's an aggressive brawler or a technical counterpuncher, Lister knows how to adjust his fighting style to gain the upper hand.

Despite his impressive physique and skillset, Paul Lister remains a humble and down-to-earth individual. He doesn't let his success get to his head and always maintains respect for his opponents. Lister believes that the true mark of a great boxer lies in their sportsmanship and character both inside and outside the ring.

Looking at Lister's boxing record, it's evident that he has achieved considerable success in his career. His win-loss ratio speaks volumes about his impact in the sport. With a majority of victories under his belt, Lister has proven time and time again that he is a force to be reckoned with.

It's not just his victories that define Paul Lister as a boxer, but also the manner in which he achieves them. Lister is known for his incredible knockout power, often leaving his opponents sprawled across the canvas. His punches possess an awe-inspiring force that can turn the tide of a fight in an instant.

However, Lister's success hasn't come without setbacks. Like any other boxer, he has faced his fair share of defeats and challenges. But what sets him apart is his unwavering determination and resilience. Lister uses these setbacks as stepping stones to improve and come back stronger in his subsequent fights.

As an avid supporter of the sport, it's hard not to acknowledge the impact that Paul Lister has made in the boxing world. His name is on the lips of fans and fellow boxers alike, as he continues to rise through the ranks and make his mark on the sport.

So, keep an eye out for Paul Lister as he continues to electrify the boxing world with his remarkable height, reach, and undeniable talent. Whether he's delivering knockout blows or showcasing his technical prowess, Lister is a force to be reckoned with. With his determination, resilience, and unwavering passion for the sport, there's no doubt that he'll continue to leave a lasting impact on the boxing world for years to come.
